text: The International Organization for Migration (IOM) has granted a tractor mounted water bowser to be used in disaster situations in Kegalle District.Operating Chief of IOM Mr. Jesaphy officially handed over the bowser to District Secretary W. Abeywickrama Wanasuriya.Officials including Coordinator of Non-Government Organizations Mr. Nishantha Premathilaka participated in this event.
title: A Tractor mounted bowser for Kegalle by IOM
